title: Taken - Before her very Eyes
description: Summer Demure — a police officer on stress leave because of a brutal abduction that nearly took her life — is elated when her abductor is finally captured and she's called upon to ID him. Everything seems about to come to an end. However, before she's able to make the ID, her husband is viciously stabbed and her daughter taken away.The ransom note has no dollar figure — only one demand. Release the man she's supposed to ID and set him free.
author: Wade Faubert
